job.title: HR Intern Earth City, MO - Data Analysis
job.industry: Logistics and Supply Chain,Public Relations and Communications,International Trade and Development
job.description: If you’re looking for a valuable opportunity with the global leader of logistics, UPS has an internship for you! UPS is seeking a Human Resources (HR) Intern to support the daily operations of the HR Department with attention to Employee Services and Workforce Planning.<br><br><strong><u>Responsibilities And Duties<br></u></strong><ul><li>Maintains accurate and updated employee files in accordance with company policies and government regulations</li><li>Assists in the development and improvement of company policies and procedures</li><li>Composes competent employee communications regarding policy and procedural changes</li><li>Reviews resumes in online database to recruit qualified individuals for specific open positions</li><li>Maintains employment resumes, applications and applicant flow logs in line with company procedures</li><li>Assists in recruitment activities and special projects, as needed</li><li>Files documents and answers phones<br></li></ul><strong><u>Knowledge And Skills<br></u></strong><ul><li>Exhibits exceptional verbal, written and interactive communication skills</li><li>Demonstrates effective research tactics; good organizational skills</li><li>Ability to maintain high standards of confidentiality</li><li>Ability to convey a positive and professional image to internal and external customers</li><li>Knowledge of Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint and Access</li><li>Junior or senior currently enrolled in a four-year college or university or in a master’s program with a preferred course of study in Human Resources Management</li><li>Knowledge of U.S. Labor Laws: FLSA, OSHA, FMLA and IRCA – Preferred<br></li></ul>UPS is an equal opportunity employer.
